name: Hazel and the Last Symbol
description:
Hazel and The last Symbol - Game Prototype.

Please watch the video, to find out more about my prototype, 

A 3D narrative driven game, with  custom made textures,  Audio/ Sound effects  and Voice acting. A large 3D Environment to explore, who knows what you may find? Your keen to wander through the forest...after all your a 12 year old who loves going on adventures...
